about.title: ABOUT ME
content: As confirmed by my portfolio content and code, I combine my knowledge, experience and skills with technology in order to develop professional and innovative web applications.

I follow OAUTH, REST and SOLID software engineering principles. I am also a fan of TDD, Agile, 12-Factor App and Block-Element-Modifier methodologies. I use after-release error logging to ensure my applications are bug-free.
By following the best practices above, I produce “clean code” which is comprehensive, easy to debug and maintain.
I have been passionate with development since childhood and enjoy learning about the latest technological advancements.

content.paragraph: Developed webisites using WordPress, OpenCart and other opensource technologies
Solely Developed a web application used as a Service Management tool by Media Ram and Media Markt (one of Europe’s largest retailer of consumer electronics).
Presented my thesis on a new data compression algorithm in the 2nd Panhellenic Conference of Computer Science in Samos called “Eureka”, which was acknowledged for its efficiency.

elements.header: Key Responsibilities include but not limited to:
list: Created SPA, user interactive (UI) web pages using web technologies like HTML5, SASS, Typescript, Angular2 and Bootstrap.
Created and used Reducers that received Actions to modify the store State.
Created Action dispatch to deploy Actions to add Dynamic Functionalities
Created custom NPM modules.
Developed administrative UI Components using Angular2, Typescript and Webpack
Used Bootstrap for Responsive Web design.
Optimized Frontend assets for speed and performance
Used Middleware, Redux-Promise in application to retrieve data from Back-End and to also perform RESTFUL services.
Created custom Angular Components including Breadcrumbs, Reactive Forms, Form Validators, Tabbed Components and Toggle Buttons.
Proficient in Java, including Spring Boot/Spring MVC and REST Web Services

elements.header: Key Responsibilities include but not limited to:
list: Created programs as per user / design requirements using AngularJS
Collaborated with cross-functional teams (DEV, UX/UI & BA) to define, design, and deliver creative digital solutions
Setting up the Front-End development environment (Angular) and processes ( Team of 2 Developers at beginning, with plan to add 3 more later on )
Utilized, automated unit tests and integration tests for application lifecycle
Executed Agile Developmental techniques
Utilized industry best practices to create effective business solutions for clients
Participated and contributed towards senior-level technology discussions
Created HTML forms using section 508 US web standards
Used Git flow techniques for feature branching, merging and continuous integration
Implemented google analytics using angularitics
Participated on OAuth implementation for user’s role and permissions using JWT (JSON web token)
Created migration scripts for Postgres database systems using Sequelize-CLI ORM
Consumed backend RESTful API services
Produced reports and statistical information for managers using code climate, and mocha testing framework
Used bootstrap CSS to create, modify and update web layouts
Created angular 1.5 components, directives and filters
Used Node JS schema validator for backend validation
Utilized, automated unit tests and integration tests for application lifecycle
Performed unit and integration test for frontend and backend systems using AngularJS and NodeJS
